A psalm for the choir director, to be accompanied by stringed instruments
God, be merciful to us and bless us;
the world may know what you want them to do,
all nations may know that you
I want them all to praise you!
nations will be glad and sing joyfully,
because you judge the people-groups equally/justly,
God, I desire that the people-groups
I want them all to praise you!
Good crops have grown on our land;
God, our God, has blessed us.
everywhere [MTY] on the earth will revere him.
